from sys import stdin, stdout # 引入这两个库

# each entry of sieve contains a prime divisor
n, m = [int(x) for x in stdin.readline().split()]
a = []
a = [int(x) for x in stdin.readline().split()] # 读取一行输入的方式;
ans = 2
num = m
for item in a:
    while item > 0:
        item -= ans
        m -= 1
        if m == 0:
            break
        pass
    if item == 0:
        ans += 1
        pass
    if m == 0:
        break
    pass
print(ans * num)

a.sort()
for i in range(n):
    if ki>=a[i]:
        ki+=1
print((ki-1)*m)

n,m = map(int,input().split())
nums = list(map(int,input().split()))
s = 2
res = 0
nowxm = 0
for _ in range(m):
    for i in range(n):
        if nums[i] == 0:continue
        if nums[i] == s:
            s += 1
            nums[i] = 0
        else:
            nums[i] -= s
        if nums[i] < 0:nowxm += 1
    res += s
print(res)

        if(lst[j]<shanghai):

from sys import stdin, stdout # 引入这两个库

# each entry of sieve contains a prime divisor
n, m = [int(x) for x in stdin.readline().split()]
a = []
a = [int(x) for x in stdin.readline().split()] # 读取一行输入的方式;
ans = 2
num = m
ok = 0
for item in a:
    while item > 0 and m > 0:
        item -= ans
        m -= 1
        if m == 0:
            break
        pass
    if item == 0:
        ans += 1
        pass
    if m == 0:
        ok = 1
        break
    pass
if ok == 0:
    print(ans * num)
    pass
else :
    print(0)
    pass

ans = 0

        a[j] -= num
        if a[j] == 0:
            num += 1
            pass
        pass
    ans += num
    pass
